abstracts.cdata!:
The principal objective of the
            Enterprise and Financial Sector Adjustment Loan Project is
            to provide timely and responsive support to Slovenia's
            efforts to implement effective reform of its enterprise and
            financial sectors.  The loan will facilitate enterprise
            privatization and restructuring, and accelerate the
            development of a strong and supportive financial sector.
            The loan will have a policy component and a technical
            assistance component.  The policy component will support the
            government's overall economic reform program including:
            (a) privatization of socially-owned enterprises, reform of
            ownership and governance of state-owned enterprises,
            implementation of programs to stem enterprise losses, and
            private sector development; (b) bank restructuring,
            enhancement of the regulatory framework for banking, and
            bank privatization; and (c) labor market adjustment and
            strengthening of the social safety net.  The technical
            assistance component will provide financing for long-term
            advisors, short-term consultants and training in core areas
            essential for successful implementation of the
            government's reform program.
